hypothesis_content.title: Gas Futures Premium → ETH Volatility Expansion
hypothesis_content.statement: When ETH gas futures 7-day premium exceeds 40% over spot gas prices, ETH 24-hour realized volatility will expand by at least 25% within the next 5 trading days as blockspace demand signals network stress.
hypothesis_content.rationale: High gas futures premium indicates anticipated network congestion, often preceding volatile price action as traders position for potential fee market spikes and network activity surges.
entry_conditions: ETH 24h realized volatility < 60% (starting from compressed state)

exit_conditions.take_profit: ETH 24h realized volatility increases by 30% from entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: ETH price breaks below $2,750 or above $3,250

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Volatility remains compressed despite high futures premium, or premium collapses without corresponding price movement.
